mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_SCRAP WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND PROGRAM_ID = #{programId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SCRAP(ID, MEMBER_ID, PROGRAM_ID) VALUES(SEQ_SCRAP.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{programId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_SCRAP WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND PROGRAM_ID = #{programId}
mapper.select: SELECT s.MEMBER_ID, s.PROGRAM_ID, p.PROGRAM_NAME, p.PROGRAM_PRICE, p.PROGRAM_END_DATE, p.PROGRAM_DETAIL, p.PROGRAM_EXPIRED, FROM TBL_SCRAP s JOIN TBL_PROGRAM p ON s.PROGRAM_ID = p.ID WHERE s.MEMBER_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SCRAP (ID, MEMBER_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_SCRAP.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{programId}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT CP.PROGRAM_NAME, CP.programEndDate, CP.PROGRAM_THUMBNAIL_PATH, CP.COMPANY_NAME FROM TBL_SCRAP S JOIN ( SELECT COMPANY_NAME, PROGRAM_THUMBNAIL_PATH, PROGRAM_END_DATE, PROGRAM_NAME, CEIL(PROGRAM_END_DATE - SYSDATE) AS programEndDate, P.ID FROM TBL_COMPANY C JOIN TBL_PROGRAM P ON C.ID = P.COMPANY_ID ) CP ON S.PROGRAM_ID = CP.ID AND MEMBER_ID = ${id}
